lines: Too many young girls are quick to pledge themselves to the first house that will have them. They think one lord is as good as any, only to learn the truth the hard way.
Mayhap it's cruel of me to say it, but any girl foolish enough to take a lordling to bed has no one to blame but herself in the end.
Will the birth of these new “Houses” change how the highborn treat the low? Makes me wonder how things might've been for that poor girl if this had happened years ago...
